Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Up ahead you'll eventually come to
the forest. There are vegetables and
other things to be found there.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can also get to the river from your
farm, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can go from here. Look at the
mini-map I just told you about and
explore a little.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's been a lot of fun talking to a
young person again!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know you'll make a big contribution
to the town. See you again soon.
